help.title: How the Anki Generator Works
help.step1Description: Upload any PDF document with educational content. The system supports files up to 30MB.
help.step2Description: Choose between testing mode for multiple-choice questions or learning mode for image-based cards.
help.step3Description: Our AI analyzes your document, extracts key concepts, and generates high-quality flashcards optimized for learning.
help.step4Description: Download your .apkg file and import it directly into Anki for immediate learning.
